external_games.name: The Sims 4 Fun Outside Bundle - Island Living, Perfect Patio Stuff, Backyard Stuff, Laundry Day Stuff

name: The Sims 4: Fun Outside Bundle
summary: Includes The Sims 4 Island Living Pack, Perfect Patio, Backyard and Laundry Day Stuff Packs. Add a brand new world of Sulani and island living for new stories. Your Sims can also enjoy patio and backyard activities or even go outside for to do laundry!
